Description: On VA-49 in the Town of Victoria, in the vicinity of Rt. 1043E/W (Lunenburg County), motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The south right lane and right shoulder are closed. The south entrance ramp narrows.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On I-77 at mile marker 4.5 in the County of Carroll, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle fire. The north right lane and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Fire

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 7 in the County of Greensville, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The south right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-77 North at mile marker 0 in the County of Carroll, motorists can expect delays due to high wind.
Label: Minor Incident - High Wind - Advisory

Description: On I-495 at mile marker 52.8 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The north right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-77 South at mile marker 24.1 in the County of Carroll, motorists can expect delays due to high wind.
Label: Minor Incident - High Wind - Advisory

Description: On Rt. 619 in the County of Franklin, in the vicinity of Emmas Rd; Rt. 844E/W (Franklin County), motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. All east lanes are closed.
